card.name: Heping, at War's End
card.text: [+1]: Until your next turn, your opponents can't cast more than one spell or draw more than one card. [0]: Another target nonland permanent phases out until your next turn. If that permanent didn't phase in this turn, Heping phases out. [-7]: Each opponent gets an emblem with "For the rest of the game, you can only attack once."

card.name: Panya, Swift and Sure
card.text: Whenever Panya attacks, amass Mice 1. If it's an extra turn, amass Mice 5 instead. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a Mouse. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 white Mouse Army creature token first.) Whenever a Mouse you control deals 2 or more combat damage to a player, planeswalker, or battle, draw a card.

card.name: Litany of Despair
card.text: When Litany of Despair enters, draw three cards and create three 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens with flying. Whenever you cast a spell, you lose 3 life unless you sacrifice a creature or discard a card.

card.name: Progeny of Bloodflame
card.text: Legion (When this creature attacks, you may pair it with another unpaired attacker until end of turn. Paired creatures gain the following abilities.) Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a token that's a copy of this creature. If this creature is attacking, the token enters tapped and attacking. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Behold the Aeons
card.text: Search your library for an artifact card, a creature card, an enchantment card, a land card, and a planeswalker card. An opponent chooses one of them. Exile the chosen card, then put the rest onto the battlefield.

card.name: The Divine Vaelias
card.text: Effigy {2}{WU} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Whenever Vaelias enters or you attack with two or more creatures, exile up to one other target nonland permanent. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. When Vaelias dies, if it's a creature, exile it. You may cast it for its effigy cost for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: The Divine Sythor
card.text: Effigy {2}{UB} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Whenever Sythor enters or you attack with two or more creatures, exile the top three cards of target opponent's library, then choose a card exiled with Sythor. You may play that card from exile as long as you control a legendary enchantment or a God. When Sythor dies, if it's a creature, exile it. You may cast it for its effigy cost for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: The Divine Velera
card.text: Effigy {1}{BR} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Whenever Velera enters or you attack with two or more creatures, the owner of target permanent an opponent controls sacrifices it unless they have Velera deal 2 damage to them. When Velera dies, if it's a creature, exile it. You may cast it for its effigy cost for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: The Divine Ozhka
card.text: Effigy {3}{RG} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Whenever Ozhka enters or you attack with two or more creatures, add {R}{R}{G}{G}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end. You can only cast one more spell this turn. When Ozhka dies, if it's a creature, exile it. You may cast it for its effigy cost for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: The Divine Marisyn
card.text: Effigy {3}{GW} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Whenever Marisyn enters or you attack with two or more creatures, create a 2/1 colorless Knight creature token. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. When Marisyn dies, if it's a creature, exile it. You may cast it for its effigy cost for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: Jorah, Godslayer
card.text: [+2]: Create a 3/3 white and black Angel creature token with flying. [+1]: Exile target legendary permanent. [-3]: Exile all other nonland permanents. [-8]: You gain 13 life. Each opponent loses 13 life.

card.name: The Divine Caele
card.text: Effigy {2}{BG} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Whenever Caele enters or you attack with two or more creatures, you may sacrifice another creature. When you do, return target creature card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield. When Caele dies, if it's a creature, exile it. You may cast it for its effigy cost for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: The Divine Elyth
card.text: Effigy {2}{GU} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Whenever Elyth enters or you attack with two or more creatures, untap all nonland permanents you control. If five or more permanents were untapped this way, draw a card. When Elyth dies, if it's a creature, exile it. You may cast it for its effigy cost for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: The Divine Xalren
card.text: Effigy {3}{UR} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Whenever Xalren enters or you attack with two or more creatures, exile your hand, then draw two cards and create a Treasure token. You may cast up to one instant or sorcery card exiled this way this turn. When Xalren dies, if it's a creature, exile it. You may cast it for its effigy cost for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: The Divine Sorella
card.text: Effigy {1}{RW} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Whenever Sorella enters or you attack with two or more creatures, you may have target creature an opponent controls block this turn if able. If you don't, that creature can't block this turn. When Sorella dies, if it's a creature, exile it. You may cast it for its effigy cost for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: Ashen Paragon
card.text: When Ashen Paragon enters, Armageddon looms. (Create a Fated War token defended by an opponent if you don't control one. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to it.) Whenever Ashen Paragon attacks, create two 1/1 black Wraith creature tokens with "This creature can't block" that are tapped and attacking. Then tokens you control gain deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Icon of the Rotten Soul
card.text: When Icon of the Rotten Soul enters, destroy target nonbasic permanent. Escape—{2}{B}{G}, Exile four cards with at least four different total card types from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

card.name: Ozhkan Blademaster
card.text: Vigilance, menace, reach Whenever Ozhkan Blademaster attacks, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Sacrifice that creature at end of combat unless it's a Wolf or a Warrior.

card.name: Form of the Blue Moon
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw two cards, then each opponent mills cards equal to the number of cards in your hand and your life total becomes that number. Nonlegendary creatures can't attack you.

card.name: The Fire and the Flood
card.text: [+1]: Create a 2/1 colorless Knight creature token, then you may exile an instant or sorcery card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard. If you do, that token gains "Whenever this creature attacks, you may cast a copy of the exiled card without paying its mana cost." [-3]: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 2/1 colorless Knight creature token. [-7]: Until end of turn, each creature you control becomes a 4/4 Dragon with flying. Tap up to four target nonland permanents.

card.name: Ivory Tactician
card.text: When Ivory Tactician enters, Armageddon looms. (Create a Fated War token defended by an opponent if you don't control one. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to it.) Whenever one or more creatures you control with power 2 or less enter, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Empyrean Challenger
card.text: Flying Legion (When this creature attacks, you may pair it with another unpaired attacker until end of turn. Paired creatures gain the following abilities.) {1}{W}: Exile this creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Sanctuary
card.text: Effigy {1}{W}{W} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Flying Whenever Sanctuary enters or attacks, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter and a flying counter on it. It's an Angel in addition to its other types.

card.name: Pledgeseeker
card.text: {2}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Pledgeseeker. Armageddon looms. Activate only as a sorcery and only once. (Create a Fated War token defended by an opponent if you don't control one. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to it.)

card.name: Fogborne Brigade
card.text: Other Knights you control get +0/+1. Whenever another nontoken Knight enters under your control, create a 2/1 colorless Knight creature token.

card.name: Annihilation
card.text: Each player who controls two or more creatures forebodes twice. Then destroy all creatures. (To forebode, create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Knightfall
card.text: Create X 2/1 colorless Knight creature tokens.

card.name: Prescient Phantom
card.text: Flying When Prescient Phantom deals combat damage to a player, planeswalker, or battle, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") {8}: The next spell you cast this turn can be cast without paying its mana cost. This ability costs {2} less to activate for each card you discarded this turn. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Astral Seamstress
card.text: Effigy {1}{U}{U} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) When Astral Seamstress enters, gain control of target creature an opponent controls for as long as you control Astral Seamstress. As long as you control Astral Seamstress, that creature can't attack or block unless Astral Seamstress is attacking or blocking.

card.name: Prismatic Nightjar
card.text: Flying Whenever Prismatic Nightjar enters or attacks, draw X cards, where X is the number of creatures you control with toughness 4 or greater. Then discard a card.

card.name: Coincidence
Selenic Augur
card.text: Flash Blue instant and sorcery cards with mana value 1 in your graveyard have flashback {U}. (You may cast a card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.) You can't cast more than two spells each turn.

card.name: See the Stars Align
card.text: Search your library for a card with flash or flashback, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Flashback {2}{U}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Savior's Quandary
card.text: Choose one — • The owner of target spell puts it on top or bottom of their library. Draw a card. • Scry 2, then draw two cards.

card.name: Deathwind Whisperer
card.text: Menace At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card and you lose 1 life. Then you may discard a card. If you do, Armageddon looms. (Create a Fated War token defended by an opponent if you don't control one. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to it.)

card.name: Bloodrift Overlord
card.text: Flying Whenever an opponent casts a spell, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice an Omen or a Demon.

card.name: Enkindled Blackblade
card.text: Deathtouch When Enkindled Blackblade enters, Armageddon looms. (Create a Fated War token defended by an opponent if you don't control one. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to it.) Whenever an ability of a Fated War you control triggers, the player protecting it loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Nachtengel
card.text: Flying, trample Legion (When this creature attacks, you may pair it with another unpaired attacker until end of turn. Paired creatures gain the following abilities.) Sacrifice this creature: Draw two cards. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Dismay
card.text: Effigy {2}{B}{B} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Menace All other creatures get -1/-1.

card.name: Abyssal Promenade
card.text: Exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create three tokens that are copies of it, except they're 2/1, they're colorless, and they're Knights in addition to their other types.

card.name: In the Shadow of Azumoth
card.text: Target creature gets -14/-14 until end of turn. Flashback {12}{B}{B}. This spell costs {1} less to cast this way for each card type among cards in your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Sorellan Lamplighter
card.text: Legion (When this creature attacks, you may pair it with another unpaired attacker until end of turn. Paired creatures gain the following abilities.) Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, planeswalker, or battle, exile the top card of each player's library. You may play one card exiled this way this turn.

card.name: Liege of the Pyre
card.text: Whenever you attack, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever you discard one or more nonland cards, create that many 2/1 colorless Knight creature tokens.

card.name: Emberblaze Warkite
card.text: Flying, haste When Emberblaze Warkite enters, Armageddon looms. (Create a Fated War token defended by an opponent if you don't control one. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to it.)

card.name: Verve
card.text: Effigy {1}{R}{R} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Double strike If a red source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead.

card.name: The Liberated Onslaught
card.text: Whenever you attack, Armageddon looms. (Create a Fated War token defended by an opponent if you don't control one. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to it.) Whenever an ability of a Fated War you control triggers, exile the top card of your library or an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. You may play that card until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Let the Fray Burn
card.text: Let the Fray Burn deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers and 3 damage to you.

card.name: Hoard
card.text: Create seven Treasure tokens.

card.name: Sundrop Cultivator
card.text: {T}: You may put a creature card with vigilance, reach, deathtouch, or trample from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate only outside of combat.

card.name: Realmsplicer
card.text: When Realmsplicer enters, choose up to one target artifact or enchantment. Its owner puts that permanent on the bottom of their library, then draws a card.

card.name: Hinterland Overseer
card.text: Effigy {1}{G} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Reach Whenever you or a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, draw a card.

card.name: Existence
card.text: Effigy {3}{G}{G} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Vigilance If one or more tokens would be created under your control, those tokens plus that many 3/3 green Beast creature tokens are created instead.

card.name: Wilderwarper
card.text: As long as you control ten or more permanents, Wilderwarper gets +3/+3. {1}{G}{G}: Create two 1/1 black Wraith creature tokens with "This creature can't block." Activate only once.

card.name: Sky's Eye Recruit
card.text: Trample Whenever a creature with toughness 4 or greater enters under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Sky's Eye Recruit.

card.name: Arboreal Embrace
card.text: For each card type, you may return a card of that type from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Arboreal Embrace. (Artifact, battle, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, and sorcery are card types.)

card.name: Caress of Moonlight
card.text: Creature cards in your hand have effigy {1}{W}{U}. Whenever you cast a spell this way, it becomes an enchantment in addition to its other types. (If you cast a spell for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.)

card.name: Righteous Archangel
card.text: Flying, vigilance Creatures with total power 5 or greater can't attack you.

card.name: Twist Perceptions
card.text: Look at the top X cards of your library and separate them into a face-up pile and a face-down pile, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast this spell. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put that pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard. Flashback {5}{U}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Syzygy Visionary
card.text: When Syzygy Visionary enters, surveil 2. At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from your library this turn, create a 2/1 colorless Knight creature token. If an instant or sorcery card was put into your graveyard from your library this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Ozhka's Ceaseless Assault
card.text: At end of combat during your turn, you may sacrifice a creature that attacked this turn. If you do, untap each creature you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Crypt Cleaver
card.text: Menace When Crypt Cleaver enters, Armageddon looms. (Create a Fated War token defended by an opponent if you don't control one. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to it.) Whenever Crypt Cleaver attacks, return up to one target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking. Exile it at end of combat.

card.name: Ozhkan Huntmaster
card.text: Whenever Ozhkan Huntmaster attacks, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever you draw your second card each turn, Ozhkan Huntmaster gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Calamity
card.text: Calamity deals 5 damage to each creature and each planeswalker. Destroy all artifacts and enchantments with mana value 5 or less. Destroy all nonbasic lands.

card.name: Remarkable Discovery
card.text: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may put up to two permanent cards with mana value 3 or less that don't share a type from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Marisyni Adherent
card.text: Vigilance, trample Whenever Marisyni Adherent attacks, target attacking token has base power and toughness 4/5 until end of turn.

card.name: Epochal Descent
card.text: Exile two target nonland permanents.

card.name: Cendris, Ashen Champion
card.text: Other Knights you control get +1/+1. Whenever you attack with two or more Knights, draw a card.

card.name: Pestilent Lieutenant
card.text: Menace, deathtouch Whenever Pestilent Lieutenant deals combat damage to a player, planeswalker, or battle, choose target card in your graveyard. Return that card to your hand unless that player pays life equal to the number of card types among cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Oakblight Sage
card.text: Ward—Discard a card. When Oakblight Sage enters, create three 1/1 black Wraith creature tokens with "This creature can't block." Whenever a 1/1 creature you control deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.

card.name: Loamlight Shepherd
card.text: Reach At the beginning of your end step, you may return a creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Oracle of Azumoth
card.text: Devoid (This card has no color.) At the beginning of your end step, create a colorless land token named Wastes with "{T}: Add {C}." {7}: Oracle of Azumoth's base power becomes equal to the number of lands you control as you activate this ability. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Seer of Sword and Sun
card.text: Whenever you cast an artifact or enchantment spell, add {U} or {R}. {UR}, {T}: Copy target triggered ability you control from an artifact or enchantment source. You may choose new targets for the copy. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

card.name: Kinetic Reaver
card.text: Flying You can't play cards from your hand. At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent chooses one. Put the chosen card into your hand and exile the rest. You may play cards exiled this way this turn.

card.name: Dragonheart Technique
card.text: Create a Weapon token attached to target creature you control. It gains lifelink until end of turn, then it deals damage equal to its power to any target. (It's an Equipment with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1.")

card.name: Blinding Herald
card.text: Creatures you control have haste. Legion (When this creature attacks, you may pair it with another unpaired attacker until end of turn. Paired creatures gain the following abilities.) Flying, menace, lifelink

card.name: The Apocalypse Pendulum
card.text: When The Apocalypse Pendulum enters, each opponent sacrifices a nonland permanent with the greatest mana value among permanents that player controls. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Memorial to the Slain
card.text: {2}, {T}: Create a 1/1 black Wraith creature token with "This creature can't block." {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a creature card with mana value 2 or less and put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Hero's Forum
card.text: As Hero's Forum enters, choose a creature type. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1. You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may cast creature spells of the chosen type from the top of your library.

card.name: Worldbraider
card.text: Vigilance, trample, reach When Worldbraider enters, reveal the top seven cards of your library. For each color, you may choose a card of that color from among them. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Tower of Measure
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Each player with the fewest cards in their hand draws a card.

card.name: Keeper of Ghostlight
card.text: Legion (When this creature attacks, you may pair it with another unpaired attacker until end of turn. Paired creatures gain the following abilities.) Lifelink

card.name: Eidolic Procession
card.text: Whenever you create a token, put a +1/+1 counter on Eidolic Procession. This ability triggers only once each turn. {2}{W}: Eidolic Procession gains agile until end of turn. (It deals combat damage first as long as it's attacking.)

card.name: Koryn Thael Guide
card.text: When Koryn Thael Guide enters, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with effigy or a Plains card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Pallid Emissary
card.text: Whenever Pallid Emissary becomes paired with a creature while attacking, tap target creature defending player controls.

card.name: Marisyni Phalanx
card.text: Effigy {1}{W} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Other attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

card.name: Oathsworn Captain
card.text: When Oathsworn Captain enters, Armageddon looms. (Create a Fated War token defended by an opponent if you don't control one. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to it.) Oathsworn Captain gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control.

card.name: Gilded Guardian
card.text: Legion (When this creature attacks, you may pair it with another unpaired attacker until end of turn. Paired creatures gain the following abilities.) Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, planeswalker, or battle, return target creature card with mana value less than this creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Waxen Lyrist
card.text: Whenever an enchantment you control enters and whenever an enchantment with effigy you control becomes a creature, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Paradigm of Frailty
card.text: Flying When Paradigm of Frailty enters, create three 1/1 black Wraith creature tokens with "This creature can't block." Whenever Paradigm of Frailty attacks, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn if you control three or more attacking tokens.

card.name: Majestic Seraph
card.text: Effigy {2}{W} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Flying, lifelink At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying.

card.name: Become Faceless
card.text: Exile target creature or enchantment. Its controller creates a 2/1 colorless Knight creature token.

card.name: One Swift Strike
card.text: Destroy target creature if it's tapped or if it has power 4 or greater.

card.name: Feather of Flight
card.text: Flash Enchant creature When Feather of Flight enters, draw a card. Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has flying.

card.name: Way of the Ashen
card.text: When Way of the Ashen enters, Armageddon looms. (Create a Fated War token defended by an opponent if you don't control one. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to it.) Whenever an ability of a Fated War you control triggers, create a 2/1 colorless Knight creature token.

card.name: Fanciful Brinedancer
card.text: Flying When Fanciful Brinedancer enters, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Scion of the Aurora
card.text: Vigilance When Scion of the Aurora enters, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever you discard a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scion of the Aurora.

card.name: Mist Whisperer
card.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Target opponent mills a card for each creature you control with toughness 4 or greater.

card.name: Star-Crossed Bride
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard or activate an ability of a card in your graveyard, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Curio Hoarder
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control an artifact and {1} less to cast if you control an enchantment. Flying

card.name: Runic Occultist
card.text: When Runic Occultist enters, forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") {T}: Draw a card if you control an artifact, then draw a card if you control an enchantment. Then if you drew one or more cards this way, discard a card.

card.name: Nightbreak Raptor
card.text: Flash Flying When Nightbreak Raptor enters, target instant or sorcery card with mana value 3 or less in your graveyard gains flashback {0} until end of turn. (You may cast it from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Ceremonial Flock
card.text: Effigy {2}{U} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Whenever an enchantment you control enters and whenever an enchantment with effigy you control becomes a creature, choose target creature an opponent controls. If it's tapped, put a stun counter on it. Otherwise, tap it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Celestial Sentry
card.text: Effigy {3}{U} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Whenever one or more creatures attack you, those creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Upset Balance
card.text: Counter target creature spell. Its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Song to the Siren
card.text: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands. Forebode twice. (To forebode, create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Taste the Waters
card.text: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Better Thy Ken
card.text: Draw two cards. Flashback—{1}{U}, Sacrifice a permanent. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Elythi Altar
card.text: When Elythi Altar enters, if you control a creature with toughness 4 or greater, draw a card. Creatures you control have vigilance. Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater enters, draw a card.

card.text: Legion (When this creature attacks, you may pair it with another unpaired attacker until end of turn. Paired creatures gain the following abilities.) {1}{R}: This creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Carmine Hellkite
card.text: Effigy {R} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Flying Whenever you draw your second card each turn, Carmine Hellkite deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Smoldered Monarch
card.text: Effigy {1}{R} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Whenever you attack, target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Lightning Strike
card.text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Draconic Resolve
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has agile. (That creature deals combat damage first as long as it's attacking.)

card.name: Sorellan Farewell
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards. Forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Mantra of Dominance
card.text: Up to two target creatures can't block this turn. Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.) Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Grasp at Lost Light
card.text: Grasp at Lost Light deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Armageddon looms. (Create a Fated War token defended by an opponent if you don't control one. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to it.)

card.name: Flames of Progress
card.text: Flames of Progress deals 6 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead. If you control an artifact and an enchantment, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Elyth's Faithful
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Escort of the Helmless
card.text: Trample Whenever Escort of the Helmless attacks, it gets +2/+1 until end of turn if you created a token this turn.

card.name: Gloamtender
card.text: When Gloamtender enters, draw a card.

card.name: Gleaming Soothsayer
card.text: When Gleaming Soothsayer enters, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Then forebode. (Create a tapped colorless Omen artifact token with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Warden of the Weald
card.text: Reach When Warden of the Weald enters, mill three cards, then you may return a land card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Solemn Packleader
card.text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, Solemn Packleader gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Mantra of Ferocity
card.text: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.) Flashback {2}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.text: Effigy {1}{G} (If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.) Vigilance When Verdant Cavalry enters, create a 2/1 colorless Knight creature token.

card.text: Target creature gets +0/+2 and gains reach and deathtouch until end of turn. Untap it.

card.name: Contest of the Just
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to whichever is greater between its power and toughness to target creature you don't control.

card.name: Wreath of Wisterias
card.text: Flash Enchant creature When Wreath of Wisterias enters, enchanted creature gains hexproof until end of turn. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
